tool_description: This dataset shows the Battery Electric Vehicles (BEVs) and Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicles (PHEVs) that are currently registered through Washington State Department of Licensing (DOL).
name: electric vehicle population
title: electric vehicle population

api_list.name: ev-page
api_list.description: Get electric vehicle data for a specific page. You can pass a page number and limit as query parameters. If no page or limit is passed, it will return data for the first page with a limit of 10.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://electric-vehicle-population.p.rapidapi.com/ev-page"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electric-vehicle-population.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://electric-vehicle-population.p.rapidapi.com/ev-page"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electric-vehicle-population.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ev-sort-year
api_list.description: Get electric vehicle data sorted by model year in descending order. You can pass a page number and limit as query parameters. If no page or limit is passed, it will return data for the first page with a limit of 10.

api_list.name: ev-model-county
api_list.description: Get electric vehicle data by model and county. You can pass a model and county as query parameters. Both model and county are required.

api_list.name: ev-top-models
api_list.description: Get the top 10 electric vehicle models. This endpoint does not accept any query parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://electric-vehicle-population.p.rapidapi.com/ev-top-models"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electric-vehicle-population.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://electric-vehicle-population.p.rapidapi.com/ev-top-models"

headers = {

print(response.json())

api_list.name: ev-model
api_list.description: Get electric vehicle data by model. You can pass a model as a query parameter. The model parameter is required.

api_list.name: ev-count
api_list.description: Get the count of electric vehicles by county. You can pass a county as a query parameter. If no county is passed, it will return the count of all electric vehicles.

api_list.name: ev-location
api_list.description: Get electric vehicle data by postal code(s). You can pass one or multiple postal codes separated by commas. If no results are found for a postal code, it will return "No results found"

api_list.name: ev-data
api_list.description: Get electric vehicle data by county, city, state, or postal code. At least one of the parameters must be provided.
